body:
Currently this tightly coupled with CUDA: `...it can be filtered by CUDA environment variable CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES. Note that this id is not visible to Tensorflow, but result after filtering by CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES is visible to TF...`.

Any plan to change that as well? Or does ROCm has similar environment variable for same functionality?
